name: Alexa Morreti
title: Lead 3D Fashion Designer
bio: Alexa is a specialized 3D fashion designer with over 8 years of experience in digital garment creation. Her expertise spans from haute couture to ready-to-wear collections, with a focus on realistic cloth simulation and texture detail.

name: Marcus Chen
title: Technical 3D Specialist
bio: Marcus specializes in technical 3D development and optimization. He brings garments from design to game-ready assets, ensuring compatibility across platforms and maintaining visual fidelity.

name: Sofia Rodriguez
title: Concept & Rendering Artist
bio: Sofia combines artistic vision with technical rendering expertise. She creates stunning photorealistic previews of garments, perfect for e-commerce and marketing campaigns.
